nodes.text: A species of rodents were small, brown furred creatures native to the Forest Moon Endor. After her parents were rescued from the Gorax, Cindel Towani held one animal of this species in the Warrick family hut.

Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure contained many real animals, including Hamsters, who were used for this species. Hamsters were mentioned by name in the non-canon special Phineas and Ferb: Star Wars, although it is not known whether these are the same species as the one portrayed in An Ewok Adventure.
